subject: p11204646
Findings: The heart size is enlarged. The mediastinal contours demonstrate engorgement of the central venous vasculature. Additionally small bilateral pleural effusions are present with basilar atelectasis. There does not appear to be appreciable interstitial edema. There is no pneumothorax.
Impression: Cardiomegaly and small bilateral pleural effusions but no evidence of CHF.
